PricingModelTotalUpfrontAmortizedFees.description: Total upfront amortized Fees per the pricing model.

PricingModelTotalUpfrontCapitalizedFees.description: Total upfront capitalized Fees per the pricing model.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansManaged.description: This is the sum of principal amount outstanding for both securitized and unsecuritized loans of all types.

PriorityOfAnyOtherAction.description: Priority number assigned to any other action or event;1 is highest priority; 2 is medium; 3 is lowest.

Indicates if the property insurance certificate is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

InsurancePropertyCertificateDocumentLink.description: Link to the Property Insurance Certificate document.

InsurancePropertyCertificateEffectiveDat.description: Effective date of the property insurance certificate.

InsurancePropertyCertificateExceptionDes.description: Description of any exceptions to the property insurance certificate.

InsurancePropertyCertificateExpirationDa.description: Expiration date of the property insurance certificate.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentSalvageValue.description: The estimated or actual value of the asset at the end of its useful life or when it is no longer serviceable (cannot be used for its original purpose).

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentSalvageValuePer.description: The estimated or actual value of the asset at the end of its useful life or when it is no longer serviceable (cannot be used for its original purpose). Value should be reported as amount per watt, and should be used with the IECREPredictedVersusActualAxis.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentUsefulLife.description: Useful life of long lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale, in 'PnYnMnDTnHnMnS' format, for example, 'P1Y5M13D' represents the reported fact of one year, five months, and thirteen days. Examples include, but not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

PropertyTaxExemptionOpinionAvailabilityO.description: Indicates if the Property Tax Exemption Opinion is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Property Tax Exemption Opinion or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.
Indicates if the Property Tax Exemption Opinion is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

PropertyTaxExemptionOpinionCounterpartie.description: Names of counterparties to the Property Tax Exemption Opinion.

PropertyTaxExemptionOpinionDocumentLink.description: Link to the Property Tax Exemption Opinion document.

PropertyTaxExemptionOpinionEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Property Tax Exemption Opinion.

PropertyTaxExemptionOpinionExceptionDesc.description: Description of any exceptions to the Property Tax Exemption Opinion or issues raised.

PropertyTaxExemptionOpinionExpirationDat.description: Expiration date of the Property Tax Exemption Opinion.

PunchListAvailabilityOfDocument.description: Indicates if the Punch List is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

PunchListCostOfOutstandingItems.description: Cost of outstanding items on the Punch List.

PunchListCounterparties.description: Names of counterparties to the Punch List.

PunchListDocumentLink.description: Link to the Punch List document.

PunchListEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Punch List.

PunchListExpectedCompletionDate.description: Expected completion date of the Punch List.

PVArrayEnergyOneYearYield.description: The PV array energy yield YA is the array energy output (DC) per rated kW(DC) of installed PV array: YA = EA / P0. Calculated  for a one year period.

PVSystemPerformanceSamplingInterval.description: Rate at which performance data is collected, for example, seconds.

PVSystemOneYearYield.description: The final PV system yield Yf is the net energy output of the entire PV system (AC) per rated kW (DC) of installed PV array: Yf = Eout / P0.Calculated  for a one year period.

QualifyingFacilitiesSelfCertificationAva.description: Indicates if the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.
Indicates if the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

QualifyingFacilitiesSelfCertificationCou.description: Names of counterparties to the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification.

QualifyingFacilitiesSelfCertificationDoc.description: Link to the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification document.

QualifyingFacilitiesSelfCertificationEff.description: Effective date of the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification.

QualifyingFacilitiesSelfCertificationExc.description: Description of any exceptions to the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification or issues raised.

QualifyingFacilitiesSelfCertificationExp.description: Expiration date of the Qualifying Facilities Self Certification.

RatedPowerPeakAC.description: AC nameplate capacity at revenue meter as built.

RatioArrayCapacityAsMeasuredToArrayCapac.description: Ratio of array capacity as measured to array capacity as rated in DC.

RealEstateTaxExpense.description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

RebateRevenue.description: Revenue from rebates from federal and state governments.

RECBuyerAcknowledgementDocumentLink.description: Link to the REC Buyer Acknowledgement document.

ReferenceOneYearYield.description: The reference yield Yr can be calculated by dividing the total in-plane irradiation by the module's reference plane of array irradiance: Yr = Hi / Gi,ref, where the reference plane of array irradiance Gi,ref (kW?m?2) is the irradiance at which P0 is determined. Calculated  for a one year period.

RegulatoryApplicationApprovalDate.description: Date on which the Qualified Facility (QF) or Exempt Wholesale Generators (EWG) application was approved.

RegulatoryApplicationSubmissionDate.description: Date on which the Qualified Facility (QF) or Exempt Wholesale Generators (EWG) application was submitted.

RegulatoryApprovalStatus.description: Describes status of regulatory approval received which can be Not Submitted, Submitted, Approved, or Declined.

RegulatoryCertificationNumber.description: Certificate number for the Qualified Facility (QF) or Exempt Wholesale Generators (EWG).

RegulatoryFacilityType.description: Describes type of regulatory facility, which can be QF (Qualified Facility), EWG (Exempt Wholesale Generators), or Not Applicable.

RegulatoryFederalEnergyRegulatoryCommiss.description: Description of the type of FERC regulation that applies to the power plant based on its capacity.

RegulatoryFERC203ApplicationApprovalNoti.description: Date on which FERC 203 application was approved.

RegulatoryFERC203ApplicationSubmissionDa.description: Date on which FERC 203 application was submitted.

RegulatoryFERC203Flag.description: Indicates if the project must file a MBR (market based rate) application under FERC 203. If the project must file an application, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

RegulatoryFERC203Status.description: Describes status of regulatory approval received for FERC 203 which can be Not Submitted, Submitted, Approved, or Declined.

RegulatoryFERC205ApplicationApprovalNoti.description: Date on which FERC 205 application was approved.

RegulatoryFERC205ApplicationSubmissionDa.description: Date on which FERC 205 application was submitted.

RegulatoryFERC205Flag.description: Indicates if the project must file a MBR (market based rate) application under FERC 205. If the project must file an application, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

RegulatoryFERC205Status.description: Describes status of regulatory approval received for FERC 205 which can be Not Submitted, Submitted, Approved, or Declined.

RegulatoryPowerMarket.description: Region where power is sold, for example California CAISO, MISO, New England, New York, Northwest, PJM, Southeast, Southwest, SPP, Texas which are markets named at ferc.gov.

RegulatoryPublicUtilitiesCommissionAppro.description: Confirmation of receipt of Public Utilities Commission (PUC) approval. If approved, TRUE; if not approved, FALSE.

RegulatorySpecialFeatures.description: Description of special features related to regulation.

RelatedPartyTransactionDescriptionOfTran.description: A description of the related party transaction, including transactions to which no amounts or nominal amounts were ascribed and such other information deemed necessary to an understanding of the effects of the transactions on the financial statements. Examples of common related party transactions are, sales, purchases and transfers of realty and personal property, services received or furnished, loans and leases to and from top management and affiliates.

RenewableEnergyCreditActualAmount.description: Actual amount of renewable energy credit.

RenewableEnergyCreditActualAmountIncepti.description: Actual amount of renewable energy credit from inception to date.

RenewableEnergyCreditActualToExpectedRev.description: Actual renewable energy credit revenue divided by expected renewable energy credit revenue.
Actual renewable energy credit revenue divided by expected renewable energy credit from inception to date.

RenewableEnergyCreditBuyerAcknowledgemen.description: Indicates if the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.
Indicates if the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.
Names of counterparties to the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement.
Effective date of the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement.
Description of any exceptions to the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement or issues raised.
Expiration date of the Renewable Energy Credit Buyer Acknowledgement.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractAmendmentEx.description: Execution date of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract Amendment which is the amendment to the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractExecutionDa.description: Execution date of the Renewable Energy Credit contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractExpirationD.description: Expiration date of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractFirmPrice.description: Value of the Renewable Energy Credit associated with the guaranteed firm volume in currency per kWh per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractFirmVolume.description: Value of the Renewable Energy Credit associated with the guaranteed firm volume in MWh per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractGuaranteedO.description: Total guaranteed output associated with the guaranteed firm volume in kWh per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractInitiationD.description: Initiation date of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractPortionOfSi.description: Renewable energy credit percentage of site based on units defined as REC portion units (the portion of the units on a site which are eligible for the REC).

RenewableEnergyCreditContractPortionOfUn.description: Description of units used to measure power system capacity for Renewable Energy Credit in power units.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractRateEscalat.description: Percent increase escalation per year of the renewable energy credit price.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractRateType.description: Description of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract rate type.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractStructure.description: Description of the structure of the Renewable Energy Credit contract.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractTerm.description: Term of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract Performance Guarantee. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

RenewableEnergyCreditContractVolumeCap.description: Maximum amount of renewable energy that can be sold over a specified time period in MWh per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract, which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditEnvironmentalAttrib.description: Name of the environmental attributes owner, per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.

RenewableEnergyCreditExpectedAmount.description: Expected amount of renewable energy credit.

RenewableEnergyCreditExpectedAmountIncep.description: Expected amount of renewable energy credit from inception to date.

RenewableEnergyCreditOfftakeAgreementAva.description: Indicates if the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.
Indicates if the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

RenewableEnergyCreditOfftakeAgreementCou.description: Names of counterparties to the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement.

RenewableEnergyCreditOfftakeAgreementDoc.description: Link to the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement document.

RenewableEnergyCreditOfftakeAgreementEff.description: Effective date of the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement.

RenewableEnergyCreditOfftakeAgreementExc.description: Description of any exceptions to the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement or issues raised.

RenewableEnergyCreditOfftakeAgreementExp.description: Expiration date of the Renewable Energy Credit Offtake Agreement.

RenewableEnergyCreditPerformanceGuarante.description: Performance guarantee as percent of P50 energy production  per the Renewable Energy Credit Contract which is the agreement between the Project Company and the REC offtaker, which could be the investor or bank.
Expiration date of the Renewable Energy Credit Contract performance guarantee.
Number of renewable energy credits guaranteed per the performance agreement.

Term in years of the Renewable Energy Credit contract performance guarantee. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.
Description of the Renewable Energy Credit contract performance guarantee.

RenewableEnergyCreditPerformaneGuarantee.description: Initiation date of the Renewable Energy Credit contract performance guarantee.

RenewableEnergyInspectionBodyName.description: Name of the renewable energy inspection body completing the annual test.

ReportableEnvironmentalConditionAction.description: Description of any action that will be taken to remedy issues with the Reportable Environmental Condition.

ReportableEnvironmentalCondition.description: Description of the Reportable Environmental Condition.

ReserveAccountNumber.description: Bank account number for the reserve.

ReserveAccountRequiredDate.description: Date on which the reserve account is required to be established.

ReserveCollateralType.description: Type of reserve collateral which could be cash or letter of credit.

ReserveFormOfCurrentReserve.description: Form of current reserve, either Letter of Credit or cash.

ReserveFundAccumulationOnSchedule.description: Indication that reserve fund has accumulated per schedule. If it is on schedule, TRUE; if it is not on schedule, FALSE.

ReserveLetterOfCreditProviderCreditRatin.description: Credit rating of provider of letter of credit, either Moody's or Standard and Poors.

ReservePreFundedAmount.description: Prefunded amount available in the reserve at the start of the project or fund.

ReservePreFundedAmountRequired.description: Amount required to be prefunded in the reserve for the project or fund.

ReservePreFundedNumberOfMonths.description: Number of prefunded months available in the reserve at the start of the project or fund.

ReservePreFundedNumberOfMonthsRequired.description: Number of prefunded months required to have available in the reserve for the project or fund.

ReserveReserveHasBeenUsed.description: Indication that reserve has been used. If it has been used, TRUE; if it has not been used, FALSE.

ReserveUse.description: Description of how the reserve funds will be used which can be for rent, maintenance or other activities.

RevenueMeterFrequency.description: Frequency of the revenue meter per manufacturer specification.

RevenueMeterAccuracyRangePercentMaximum.description: Percent maximum accuracy of the revenue meter, per manufacturer specification.

RevenueMeterAccuracyRangePercentMinimum.description: Percent minimum accuracy of the revenue meter, per manufacturer specification.

RevenueMeterPhase.description: Description of the phases of the revenue meter, for example, 240 VAC single phase, per manufacturer specification.

RevenueMeterSocketType.description: Socket type of the revenue meter, per manufacturer specification.

RevenueMeterStartingWatts.description: Description of the amount of watts needed to start the revenue meter, for example less 5 Watts, per manufacturer specification.

RevenueMeterTypicalWattLoss.description: Typical amount of watts lost through the revenue meter, per manufacturer specification.

RevenueMeterOperationalTemperatureRangeM.description: Maximum operating temperature of the revenue meter. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.
Minimum operating temperature of the revenue meter. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

RevenueMeterEnclosure.description: Description of the enclosure for the revenue meter, for example NEMA 3 R type.

RevenueMeterRatingContinuousVoltage.description: AC voltage of the revenue meter.

RevenueMeterMaximumRatingContinuousVolta.description: AC voltage of the line to line revenue meter.
AC voltage of the line to neutral revenue meter.

RevenueMeterMaximumRatingContinuousCurre.description: Rated continuous AC current of the revenue meter.

RevenueMeterOperationalTemperature.description: Operational temperature of the revenue meter. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

RevenueMeterVoltageRatingAccuracyRange.description: Accuracy range of the revenue meter voltage, for example +/- 20%.

RevenueMeterKilovoltAmpereReactiveData.description: Indication as to whether revenue meter kVar data has been collected. If data has been collected, TRUE; if data has not been collected, FALSE.

RevenueMeterPhaseData.description: Indication as to whether phase data has been collected. If data has been collected, TRUE; if data has not been collected, FALSE.

RevenueMeterPowerFactor.description: Measure of the power factor of the power system.

RiskPriorityNumber.description: Risk Priority Number which is a numeric indicator of the health of the plant.

RoofSlopeType.description: Type of roof slope which can be flat, sloped or steep.

RoofType.description: Type of roof which can be Thermoplastic Polyolefin, Ethylene Propylene Diene Terpolymer, Polyvinyl Chloride, Built Up Bituminous, SBS, Asphalt Shingle, Wood Shingle, Composite Shingle, Slate, Metal Roof, Tile Clay, Tile Concrete.

SaleAndLeasebackTransactionGainLossNet.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale and leaseback transaction from transfer of asset accounted for as sale.

SaleLeasebackTransactionAccumulatedDepre.description: The accumulated depreciation and amortization related to the asset(s) sold in connection with the property sold to another party and leased back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionAmountDueUnderFi.description: The liability due as of the balance sheet date for leasebacks accounted for using the deposit method.

SaleLeasebackTransactionAnnualRentalPaym.description: The yearly payments due under the lease entered into in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionCircumstancesReq.description: Instances where future commitments are required by the seller-lessee in a transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionCumulativeGainRe.description: Cumulative amount of gain recognized (out of deferred gain) as income or a reduction in rent expense.

SaleLeasebackTransactionCurrentPeriodGai.description: The portion of the deferred gain that was recognized in the current period.

SaleLeasebackTransactionDate.description: The date of the transaction involving the sale of the property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionDeferredGainGros.description: The amount of the gain recorded in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller to be recognized in future periods.

SaleLeasebackTransactionDeferredGainNet.description: The portion of the gain that will be recorded as income or a reduction in rent expense in future periods less amounts recognized in the current period.

SaleLeasebackTransactionDescription.description: A description of the significant provisions of the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionDescriptionOfAcc.description: A description of whether the lease entered into in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller was accounted for as an operating or capital lease. If the sale of the asset(s) did not meet the requirements to be accounted for as a sale, whether the transaction was accounted for using the deposit method or as a financing.

SaleLeasebackTransactionDescriptionOfAss.description: A description of the transaction and the assets involved in the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsFin.description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

SaleLeasebackTransactionGrossProceedsInv.description: Amount of cash inflow before closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities.

SaleLeasebackTransactionHistoricalCost.description: The historical cost of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionImputedInterestR.description: The financing cost related to leases that have been recorded under the deposit method, as a financing or as a capital leases in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionLeaseTerms.description: A description of the terms of the lease(s) related to the assets being leased-back in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionMonthlyRentalPay.description: The amount of the monthly rental payments due under the lease entered into in connection with the transactions involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetBookValue.description: The net book value of the asset(s) sold in connection with the sale of the property to another party and lease back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceedsFinan.description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities.

SaleLeasebackTransactionNetProceedsInves.description: Amount of cash inflow after closing and debt issuance costs received by a seller-lessee in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities.

SaleLeasebackTransactionOtherInformation.description: A description of any other information relevant to the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionOtherPaymentsReq.description: Other amounts the seller-lessee is required to pay under the terms of the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and lease of the property back to the seller, including reimbursements for such items, as utilities, taxes, insurance and common area maintenance.

SaleLeasebackTransactionQuarterlyRentalP.description: The amount of the quarterly rental payments due under the lease entered into in connection with the transactions involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionRentExpense.description: The amount of the current period expense recorded for use of the property in connection with the transaction involving the sale of property to another party and the lease of the property back to the seller.

SaleLeasebackTransactionTransactionCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for transaction costs in a sale-leaseback recognized in financing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, closing and debt issuance costs.
Amount of cash outflow for transaction costs in a sale-leaseback recognized in investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, closing and debt issuance costs.

SaleLeasebackCounterparty.description: Name of the counterparty to the sale leaseback.

SaleLeasebackCounterpartyAddress.description: Address of the counterparty to the sale leaseback.

SaleLeasebackCounterpartyJurisdiction.description: Description of the type of counterparty in the sale leaseback. For example, trust.

SaleLeasebackCounterpartyType.description: Jurisdiction of the counterparty in the sale leaseback, for example, name of the state.

SaleLeasebackExecutionDate.description: Date of execution of the sale leaseback contract. May be the same as the commencement date of the sale leaseback.

SaleLeasebackExpirationDate.description: Date which sale leaseback or group of sale leasebacks is set to expire, in CCYY-MM-DD format.

SaleLeasebackTermOfContract.description: Contract term of the sale leaseback. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

SchedulingAndForecastingExpense.description: Expense for scheduling and forecasting service for most utility scale projects.

SecurityAgreementSupplementAvailabilityO.description: Indicates if the Security Agreement Supplement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Security Agreement Supplement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.
Indicates if the Security Agreement Supplement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

SecurityAgreementSupplementExceptionDesc.description: Description of any exceptions to the Security Agreement Supplement or issues raised.

SecurityAgreementSupplementExpirationDat.description: Expiration date of the Security Agreement Supplement.

SecurityCompany.description: Name of the company providing security.

SecurityEmailAndPhone.description: Email and phone number of the company providing security.

SecurityEquipmentMaintenanceExpense.description: Cost of maintaining the security equipment.

SecurityInterestInAssetManagementAgreeme.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Asset Management Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInEngineeringProcurement.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Engineering Procurement and Construction Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInEquityCapitalContribut.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Equity Capital Contribution Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInHedgeAgreement.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Hedge Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInIndividualContractorAg.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Individual Contractor Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInLeaseSchedule.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Lease Schedule. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInLimitedLiabilityCompan.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Limited Liability Company Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInMasterLeaseAgreement.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Master Lease Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInOperationsandMaintenan.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Operations and Maintenance Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInPowerPurchaseAgreement.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Power Purchase Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInSiteLeaseAgreement.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Site Lease Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInSitePermit.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Site Permit Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestInTermLoanAgreement.description: Indicates if there is security interest in the Term Loan Agreement. If it is, TRUE; if it is not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestProvider.description: Name of individual or organization providing the security interest.

SecurityInterestReceiver.description: Name of individual or organization receiving the security interest.

SecurityInterestsAssetSecuredType.description: Type of asset being secured, which can be Land, Membership Interest, Contract, Bank Account.

SecurityInterestsBankAccountNumber.description: Identifies bank account for the security interest.

SecurityInterestsGranteeCounterpartyIden.description: Identifier for the Counterparty which is a grantee.

SecurityInterestsGranteeSPVIdentifier.description: Identifier for the SPV which is a grantee.

SecurityInterestsGranteeType.description: Indicates if the grantee is an SPV or a counterparty.

SecurityInterestsGrantorCounterpartyIden.description: Identifier for the Counterparty which is a grantor.

SecurityInterestsGrantorSPVIdentifier.description: Identifier for the Special Purpose Vehicle which is a grantor.

SecurityInterestsGrantorType.description: Indicates if the grantor is a project company or a counterparty.

SecurityInterestsInterestRecordedFlag.description: Indicates if interest is recorded for security interests. If it is recorded, TRUE; if not, FALSE.

SecurityInterestsStatus.description: Status of Security Interest which can be Not Due, Over Due, Granted, Expired.

SecurityInterestsType.description: Type of Security Interest, which can be Mortgage, Deed of Trust, Lien, Pledge, Collateral Assignment.

SecurityLocalCompanyExpenseForResponse.description: Cost for local security company to respond to an event.

SecurityTransportationExpense.description: Transportation expense for the security company.

SeriesResistanceModelFactorTMYPercent.description: Percentage of kWh lost due to Ohmic losses (both AC and DC), for a typical meteorological year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

SeriesResistanceModelFactorTMMPercent.description: Percentage of kWh lost due to Ohmic losses (both AC and DC), for a typical meteorological month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

ShadingModelFactorTMYPercent.description: Percentage of kWh lost due to shading, for a typical meteorological year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

ShadingModelFactorTMMPercent.description: Percentage of kWh lost due to shading, for a typical meteorogical month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

SharedFacilityAgreementAvailabilityOfDoc.description: Indicates if the Shared Facility Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Shared Facility Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

SharedFacilityAgreementAvailabilityOfFin.description: Indicates if the Shared Facility Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

SharedFacilityAgreementDocumentLink.description: Link to the Shared Facility Agreement document.

SharedFacilityAgreementExceptionDescript.description: Description of any exceptions to the Shared Facility Agreement or issues raised.

SharedFacilityAgreementExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the Shared Facility Agreement.

SiteAcreage.description: Number of acres in the site.

SiteAddress1.description: First line of the address of the site.

SiteAddress2.description: Second line of the address of the site.

SiteAddressCountry.description: ISO country code where the site is located.

SiteAddressState.description: State or province where the system is based.

SiteAddressZipCode.description: Zip (postal) Code where the site is based.

SiteClimateClassificationKoppen.description: Indicates the climate zone for the site using Koppen Climate Classifications of 2.1 Tropical/megathermal climates, 2.1.1 Tropical rainforest climate, 2.1.2 Tropical monsoon climate, 2.1.3 Tropical wet and dry or savanna climates, 2.2 Dry (desert and semi-arid) climates, 2.3 Temperate/mesothermal climates, 2.3.1 Mediterranean climates, 2.3.2 Humid subtropical climates, 2.3.3 Oceanic climates, 2.3.4 Highland climates, 2.4 Continental/microthermal climates, 2.4.1 Hot summer continental climates, 2.4.2 Warm summer continental or hemiboreal climates, 2.4.3 Subarctic or boreal climates, 2.5 Polar climates.

SiteClimateZoneTypeANSI.description:
Indicates the climate zone for the site which can be Very Hot - Humid (1A), Very Hot - Dry (1B), Hot - Humid (2A), Hot - Dry (2B), Warm - Humid (3A), Warm - Dry (3B), Warm - Marine (3C), Mixed - Humid (4A), Mixed - Dry (4B), Mixed - Marine (4C),  Cool - Humid (5A), Cool - Dry (5B), Cool - Marine (5C), Cold - Humid (6A), Cold - Dry (6B), Very Cold (7), Subarctic (8), per International Climate Zone Definitions ANSI/ASHRAE/IESNA Standard 90.1-2007 Normative Appendix B  Building Envelope
Climate Criteria.

SiteCollectionSubstationAvailability.description: Indication as to whether there is a data collection substation located at the site.

SiteControlContractStructureAndHistory.description: Description of contract structure and history per Site Control.

SiteControlEffectiveDate.description: Effective date when developer will have control of the site.

SiteControlEndofTermProvisions.description: Description of end of term provisions.

SiteControlHostCompany.description: Name of the Site Control Host Company.

SiteControlLessee.description: Name of lessee of the site where the system is located.

SiteControlLessor.description: Name of lessor of the site where the system is located.

SiteControlNumberOfSites.description: Number of sites per Site Control.

SiteControlRent.description: Amount of rent for the site where the system is located.

SiteControlRequiredSiteAccessNotice.description: Description of required site access notice.

SiteControlSiteAccessAgreementCounterpar.description: Counterparty to the Site Access Agreement.

SiteControlSiteAccessRequirements.description: Description of requirements to access the site.

SiteControlSiteHostContactNameAndTitle.description: Name and title of the host (owner) of the site.

SiteControlSiteHostEmailAndPhone.description: Email and phone number of the host (owner) of the site.

SiteControlSpecialFeatures.description: Description of special features of the site.

SiteControlTerm.description: Term of the site control in years. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

SiteControlTitlePolicy.description: Description of the Title Policy of the site.

SiteControlType.description: Type of control relationship between the developer and the site, which can be Own, Lease, Easement, or Combination.

SiteElevationAverage.description: Average altitude of PV system array.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionBirdPopulation.description: Indicates if bird population conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionDieselSoot.description: Indicates if diesel soot conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionDust.description: Indicates if dust conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionHail.description: Indicates if hail conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionHighInsolation.description: Indicates if high insolation conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionHighWind.description: Indicates if high wind conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionIndustrialEmis.description: Indicates if industrial emission conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionPollen.description: Indicates if pollen conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteEnvironmentalConditionSaltAir.description: Indicates if salt air conditions exist at the site. If they do, TRUE; if they do not, FALSE.

SiteGeospatialBoundaryDescription.description: Description of the geospatial boundaries of the site.

SiteGeospatialBoundaryFileURI.description: URI of the geospatial boundary information file.

SiteGeospatialBoundaryGISFileFormat.description: File type of the geospatial boundary information file which can be GEOJson, Shapefile, KML, or GML.

SiteIdentifier.description: Universally unique identifier for the site.

SiteLatitudeAtRevenueMeter.description: The latitude of the system at the system meter. The value should be entered in decimal degrees.

SiteLatitudeAtSystemEntrance.description: The latitude of the system at the system entrance. The value should be entered in decimal degrees.

SiteLeaseAccessAgreementAvailabilityOfDo.description: Indicates if the Site Lease Access Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Site Lease Access Agreement. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

SiteLeaseAccessAgreementAvailabilityOfFi.description: Indicates if the Site Lease Access Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

SiteLeaseAccessAgreementDocumentLink.description: Link to the Site Lease Access Agreement document.

SiteLeaseAccessAgreementExceptionDescrip.description: Description of any exceptions to the Site Lease Access Agreement.

SiteLeaseAgreementCounterparty.description: Name of the lessor of the site per the Site Lease Agreement.

SiteLeaseAgreementExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the Site Lease Agreement.

SiteLeaseAgreementInitiationDate.description: Initiation date of the Site Lease Agreement.

SiteLeaseAgreementRateEscalator.description: Rate escalator percent of the Site Lease Agreement.

SiteLeaseAgreementRateExpense.description: Annual cost of rent for the site per the Site Lease Agreement.

SiteLeaseAgreementRateType.description: Description of rate type of Site Lease Agreement.

SiteLeaseAgreementTerm.description: Term of the Site Lease Agreement. The value should be entered using the ISO8601 format of PnYnMnDTnHnMnS. For example, a 5-year term would be represented as P5Y, a 3-month term as P3M, and a 4-year, 6-month and 10-day term would be represented as P4Y6M10D.

SiteLeaseAgreementType.description: Description of the type of Site Lease Agreement.

SiteLeaseAssignmentAvailabilityOfDocumen.description: Indicates if the Site Lease Assignment is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Site Lease Assignment or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

SiteLeaseAssignmentAvailabilityOfFinalDo.description: Indicates if the Site Lease Assignment is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

SiteLeaseAssignmentCounterparties.description: Names of counterparties to the Site Lease Assignment.

SiteLeaseAssignmentDocumentLink.description: Link to the Site Lease Assignment document.

SiteLeaseAssignmentEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Site Lease Assignment.

SiteLeaseAssignmentExceptionDescription.description: Description of any exceptions to the Site Lease Assignment or issues raised.

SiteLeaseAssignmentExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the Site Lease Assignment.

SiteLeaseDetails.description: Details about the site lease. For example, could include existence of a land remediation bond.

SiteLeaseMemoAvailabilityOfDocument.description: Indicates if the Site Lease Memo is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

SiteLeaseMemoAvailabilityOfDocumentExcep.description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Site Lease Memo or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

SiteLeaseMemoAvailabilityOfFinalDocument.description: Indicates if the Site Lease Memo is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

SiteLeaseMemoCounterparties.description: Names of counterparties to the Site Lease Memo.

SiteLeaseMemoDocumentLink.description: Link to the Site Lease Memo document.

SiteLeaseMemoEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Site Lease Memo.

SiteLeaseMemoExceptionDescription.description: Description of any exceptions to the Site Lease Memo or issues raised.

SiteLeaseMemoExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the Site Lease Memo.

SiteLicenseAgreementAvailabilityOfDocume.description: Indicates if the Site License Agreement is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Site License Agreement or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

SiteLicenseAgreementAvailabilityOfFinalD.description: Indicates if the Site License Agreement is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

SiteLicenseAgreementCounterparties.description: Names of counterparties to the Site License Agreement.

SiteLicenseAgreementEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Site License Agreement.

SiteLicenseAgreementExceptionDescription.description: Description of any exceptions to the Site License Agreement or issues raised.

SiteLicenseAgreementExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the Site License Agreement.

SiteLicenseAgreementLink.description: Link to the Site License Agreement document.

SiteLongitudeAtRevenueMeter.description: The longitude of the system at the system meter. The value should be entered in decimal degrees.

SiteLongitudeAtSystemEntrance.description: The longitude of the system at the system entrance. The value should be entered in decimal degrees.

SiteMandatoryAccessRequirements.description: Description of mandatory requirements for access to the site, such as background checks.

SiteNaturalDisasterRisk.description: Description of the potential for natural disasters on or near the site, for example, wildfires, flood, windstorms.

SiteParcelIdentifier.description: Assessors parcel number, or APN, which is a number assigned to parcels of real property by the tax assessor of a particular jurisdiction for purposes of identification and record-keeping.

SitePropertyAppraisalURI.description: URI location where PDF of site appraisal is stored.

SitePropertyGeotechnicalURI.description: URI location where PDF of site geotechnical report is stored.

SitePropertyLocationOfKeys.description: Description of the location of physical keys to the system.

SitePropertyLocationOfWaterHookups.description: Description of the location of water hookups at the system.

SitePropertyMapsURI.description: URI location where PDF of site maps are stored.

SitePropertyOccupancyType.description: The occupancy status of the building upon which the PV system is installed. Can be either Owner Occupied or Rental.

SitePropertyOtherExpensesEstimatedSystem.description: Estimated system removal costs in the event the project is removed, for example, due to permitting or lease agreement.

SitePropertyOtherExpensesConsumablesExpe.description: Expense to store consumables, which are parts that are expected to be used up and in need of replacement on a regular basis, like fuses.

SitePropertyOtherExpensesTechnicianSalar.description: Salary and benefits expense for technicians.

SitePropertyPhotosURI.description: URI location where PDF of site photos are stored.

SitePropertySparePartsInventory.description: Description of the location of spare parts inventory for the system.

SitePropertyConsumablesInventory.description: Description of the location of consumables which are items such as fuses that are used up quickly and must be replenished.

SitePropertySubType.description: The legal description of the building relative to property type.

SitePropertySurveyURI.description: URI location where PDF of site surveys are stored.

SiteType.description: Description of the type of site, for example, campus, store, factory.

SiteUTCOffset.description: The UTC offset for the site which is the difference in minutes from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) .

SizeMegawatts.description: Size of the entity in megawatts.

SizeValue.description: Total investment value of the entity.

SnowModelFactorTMYPercent.description: Percentage of kWh lost due to snow based on typical meteorogical year, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

SnowModelFactorTMMPercent.description: Percentage of kWh lost due to snow based on typical meteorogical month, calculation based on major design/energy production model used.

SoilingModelFactorTMYPercent.description: Percentage of kWh lost due to soiling based on typical meteorogical year, calculation based on major design model used.

SoilingModelFactorTMMPercent.description: Percentage of kWh lost due to soiling based on typical meteorological month, calculation based on major design model used.

SolarArrayNumberOfPanelsInArray.description: Number of solar panels or modules in an array.

SolarArrayNumberOfInvertersConnectedToAr.description: Number of inverters connected to an array.

SolarArrayAnnualDegradation.description: Percent capacity of the array lost each year due to degradation.

SourceOfFundsBankFundedFlag.description: Indication as to whether the funding source is a bank entity. If it is a bank, TRUE; if it is not a bank, FALSE.

SourceOfFundsCounterpartyIdentifier.description: Identifier for the counterparty that is providing the funds.

SourceOfFundsDescription.description: Description of the contribution made, for example, Bank contributed 45% of funds for initial funding of XYZ project.

SourceOfFundsSPVIdentifier.description: Identifier for the SPV that is providing the funds.

SourceOfFundsSPVOrCounterparty.description: Indication as to whether the source is an SPV entity or Counterparty.

EntityIncorporationDateOfIncorporation.description: Date when an entity was incorporated

EntityIncorporationStateCountryName.description: State or Country Name where an entity is incorporated

LegalEntityArticlesOfOrganizationAvailab.description: Indicates availability of the Legal Entity articles of organization. If available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

LegalEntityArticlesOfOrganizationLink.description: Link to a copy of the articles of organization for the legal entity.

SpecialPurposeVehicleBankInternalCode.description: Bank internal code for the Special Purpose Vehicle.

LegalEntityCertificateOfOrganizationAvai.description: Indicates availability of the legal entities certificate of organization. If available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

SpecialPurposeVehicleDateEstablished.description: Date on which the Special Purpose Vehicle was established.

LegalEntityType.description: Description of the type of legal entity, for example LLC or Corporation.

LegalEntityOperatingAgreementAvailabilit.description: Indicates availability of the legal entity operating agreement. If available, TRUE; if not available, FALSE.

LegalEntityCertificateOfOrganizationLink.description: Link to the certificate of organization for the legal entity.

LegalEntityOperatingAgreementLink.description: Link to a copy of operating agreement for the Legal Entity.

SpecialPurposeVehicleType.description: Description of the type of Special Purpose Vehicle, for example Project Company or Fund Company.

StandardsApplicable.description: Description of the standard or source of publicly available procedure that is applicable to the data needed.

StartDateOfElectricalEnergyTest.description: Time stamp indicating first day of IEC 61724-3 test, administered under OD-402.

StartDateOfElectricalPowerTest.description: Time stamp indicating the first day of the IEC 61724-2 test, administered under OD-401 or OD-402.

StatedUncertaintyOfExpectedEnergyBasedOn.description: Uncertainty in expected energy arising from all factors (including bias and precision) of energy measured, expressed as +/- percent uncertainty.
Uncertainty in expected energy arising from uncertainty in the measured weather data, expressed as +/- percent uncertainty. For example, 3% uncertain that the expected energy will be xx.

SubArrayGeospatialLayoutFileFormat.description: Type of file format used for the GIS File which could be GeoJSON, Shapefile, KML or GML.

SubArrayGeospatialLayoutFileLink.description: Link to the SubArray Geospatial Layout (GIS) file.

SubArrayIdentifier.description: Unique Identifier used to identify the subarray

SubstantialCompletionCertificateAvailabi.description: Indicates if the Substantial Completion Certificate is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.
Indicates if there are exceptions to the Substantial Completion Certificate. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.
Indicates if the Substantial Completion Certificate is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

SubstantialCompletionCertificateCounterp.description: Names of counterparties to the Substantial Completion Certificate.

SubstantialCompletionCertificateDocument.description: Link to the Substantial Completion Certificate document.

SubstantialCompletionCertificateEffectiv.description: Effective date of the Substantial Completion Certificate.

SubstantialCompletionCertificateExceptio.description: Description of any exceptions to the Substantial Completion Certificate.

SupplyAgreementsAvailabilityOfDocument.description: Indicates if the Supply Agreements is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

SupplyAgreementsAvailabilityOfDocumentEx.description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Supply Agreements or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

SupplyAgreementsAvailabilityOfFinalDocum.description: Indicates if the Supply Agreements is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

SupplyAgreementsCounterparties.description: Names of counterparties to the Supply Agreements.

SupplyAgreementsDocumentLink.description: Link to the Supply Agreements document.

SupplyAgreementsEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Supply Agreements.

SupplyAgreementsExceptionDescription.description: Description of any exceptions to the Supply Agreements or issues raised.

SupplyAgreementsExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the Supply Agreements.

SuretyBondFormAndVersionNumber.description: Description of the surety bond form used which can include the name of the form and version number. For example, a form provided by the Association of General Contractors or ACORD.

SuretyPrincipal.description: The name of the Principal to a surety bond, which is a promise by a surety or guarantor to pay one party (the obligee) a certain amount if a second party (the principal) fails to meet some obligation, such as fulfilling the terms of a contract.

SuretyPrincipalEmail.description: Email address of the Principal to the surety bond.

SuretyObligeeEmail.description: Email address of the Obligee to the surety bond.

SuretyBondNumber.description: Surety bond number which is assigned by the surety company and is the surety company's unique identifier.

InsuranceCarrierEmail.description: Email address of the insurance carrier or the surety carrier.

SuretyBondIsElectronic.description: Flag indicating if the surety bond is electronic. If it is electronic, TRUE; if it is not electronic, FALSE.

SuretyElectronicBondValidationWebSite.description: Validation web site of the surety electronic bond carrier.

SuretyElectronicBondVerificationNumber.description: Bond Verification Number which comes from the Electronic Bond Provider and is unique to their system.

SuretyAnnualPremium.description: Annual amount of the surety premium.

SuretyBondEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the surety bond.

SuretyBondContractDate.description: Contract date of the surety bond.

SuretyContractDescription.description: Description of the surety bond contract.

SuretyLegalJurisdiction.description: Jurisdiction for the bond which is usually identified in the contract, to be used to determine where a case would be brought in the event of a dispute.

SystemAvailabilityMode.description: Indicates the system availability mode which can be  Islanded, Standby, Environment, Grid, Shutdown, Forced, or Emergency.

SystemBatteryConnection.description: Explains how the battery is coupled with the system which can be DC-coupled or AC-coupled.

SystemDateCompletedCommissioning.description: Date of commissioning which includes conditional acceptance by owner.

SystemDateElectricalCompletion.description: Date when the electrical system is complete including capability to connect to the grid, but it is not yet fully tested and not necessarily connected to grid.

SystemDateFinalAcceptance.description: Date when owner accepts system, usually approximately one year after operation begins.

SystemDateFinalCompletion.description: Date when owner accepts system as final per EPC Agreement.

SystemDateIssueForProcurement.description: Date at which the design is completed and ready to move forward with ordering equipment and starting construction.

SystemDatePlacedInService.description: Date at which the installation obtains Placed in Service (PIS) Status. This is used for tax purposes and means the system has met the following: (1) It is synched with the grid, (2) it has no major outstanding permits, (3) it has or is capable of commencing delivery of energy to the grid, (4) care, custody and control of the system has been transferred to the operator, and (5) critical tests are complete, for example, those required by the EPC and interconnection agreements.

SystemDateSubstantialCompletion.description: Date when the power system has been interconnected and is ready to generate power. This date is often used for funding purposes.

SystemDateInterconnectAvailability.description: Date when all of the equipment is in place, so the installation could connect to the grid, (ready to request PTO - permission to operate), but do not yet have permission.

SystemDateMechanicalCompletion.description: Date when all major equipment has been installed, but the project is not yet interconnected to the grid.

SystemDecommissioningDate.description: Date when the system is decommissioned.

EntityAuthorizedToViewSecurityData.description: Name of the person or entity authorized to access security data about the system.

SystemExpectedCommercialOperationsDate.description: Date the operations of the entity are expected to commence which is when interconnection is made and electricity starts flowing onto the grid.

SystemCommercialOperationsDate.description: Date the operations of the entity commenced which is when interconnection is made and electricity starts flowing onto the grid, may also be called Operations Commenced Date.

SystemPermissionToOperateDate.description: Date at which conditional acceptance and permission from the utility is completed and the project has moved into the operating phase.

SystemEngineeringProcurementAndConstruct.description: Engineering procurement and construction costs of the system.

SystemCostInstallationCostsManufacturer.description: Installation Costs paid to the manufacturer, excludes cost of equipment.

SystemCostInstallationEngineeringAndDesi.description: Installation Costs paid to the manufacturer, excludes cost of equipment.

SystemCostInstallationLaborCosts.description: Installation Labor Costs excluding manufactuer costs with a labor component.

SystemCostInstallationMunicipalInspectio.description: Costs of Municipal Inspection at installation.

SystemCostInstallationUtilityInspections.description: Costs of utility inspection at installation.

SystemCostOtherSystemCost.description: Other costs associated with the system implementation.

SystemDegradationRate.description: Actual degradation rate of the system, in percent of kWh lost.

SystemNumberOfModules.description: Aggregate number of modules (panels) in a system.

SystemDERType.description: DER (Distributed Energy Resource) type of the system, which could be PV System Only, Storage Only, PV plus Storage, Wind or PV Charging Station.

SystemDrawing.description: URL link to the drawing of the system.

SystemGridChargingCapability.description: Indication as to whether the system allows for grid charging.

SystemOperationStatus.description: Indicates the operational status of the system which can be operational, under maintenance, communication failure, or decommissioned.

SystemInstallerCompany.description: Name of the company that has or will install the system.

SystemMonitoringCompany.description: Name of the company that monitors the system.

SystemOperatorName.description: Name of company that is responsible for operating the system.

SystemAvailabilityActualPercentUptime.description: Actual percent uptime of the project during normal operating conditions for a specified month, availability defined per IECRE 61724-3 or through another standard method.

SystemAvailabilityActualPercentUptimeInc.description: Percent uptime of the project during normal operating conditions from inception to date, actual, availability defined per IECRE 61724-3 or through another standard method.

SystemAvailabilityAchievementRequired.description: Percent availability required to meet the achievement goal, for example 98% plant availability.

SystemAvailabilityAchievementRequiredPer.description: Description of the system availability achievement requirement, for example, 98% availability over two years.

SystemAvailabilityAchievementRequiredRec.description: Reconciliation period during which the system availability must be met.
Units, for example, months, years, for the reconciliation period during which the system availability must be met.

SystemCapacityPeakDC.description: DC capacity of the system at Standard Test Condition (STC), often referred to as kWp (kilowatt peak).

SystemPerformanceCombinerBoxTemperature.description: Temperature of the combiner box, the mechanism that brings together multiple solar strings. Can be reported as Celsius or Fahrenheit by the preparer when specifying units in the instance document.

SystemPerformanceDCInputCurrent.description: Amount of DC input in current, measured in amps.

SystemPerformanceDCInputPower.description: Amount of DC input measured in power which is voltage times current.

SystemPerformanceDCInputVoltage.description: Amount of DC input in voltage, measured in volts.

SystemPerformanceEnergyAvgMonthlyIncepti.description: Computed average monthly energy production, since Activation Date (in kWh).

OperationalEventEstimatedEnergyLost.description: Estimated energy lost in kWh which could be associated with a specific event or downtime.

ExpectedInsolationAtP50.description: Expected average P50 insolation generated in kWh per square meter. The value can be reported for the period defined on the PeriodAxis, for example to record the average insolation for Q1, this element would be used with the PeriodFirstQuarterMember on the Period Axis.

ExpectedInsolationAtP50InceptionToDate.description: Expected average P50 insolation generated in kWh per square meters from inception to date.

SystemAvailabilityExpectedPercentUptime.description: Expected percent uptime of the project during normal operating conditions for a specified month, defined per IECRE 61724-3 or through another standard method.

SystemAvailabilityExpectedPercentUptimeI.description: Percent uptime of the project during normal operating conditions from inception to date, expected, availability defined per IECRE 61724-3 or through another standard method.

SystemPerformanceGlobalHorizontalIrradia.description: Total amount of shortwave radiation received from above by a surface horizontal to the ground at the location of the solar installation, measured in watts per square meter.

SystemPerformanceGridFrequency.description: Frequency of the current being exported to the grid in hertz. This is a static amount that the system uses rather than the hertz at a point in time.

SystemPerformanceInsolationOverLifetime-.description: Actual measured insolation of the system since activation date in kWh/square meter.

MeasuredEnergy.description: Energy measured at the revenue meter for the indicated time period according to IEC 61724-3 Section 6.7.

MeasuredEnergyWeatherAdjustedAverageForP.description: Computed average energy generated for the period, adjusted for the difference between measured weather conditions, e.g., irradiance and temperature, and expected weather conditions for the same period during the Typical Meteorological Year or the equivalent used to predict P50 energy generation and the expected degradation rate. The period is defined on the PeriodAxis over all years of operation since activation date in kWh. To record the average energy for Q1 for example this element would be used with the PeriodFirstQuarterMember on the Period Axis. If the period axis is not used this represents the energy over all years of operation since Activation Date (in kWh).

MeasuredEnergyAverageForPeriod.description: Computed average energy production for the period defined on the PeriodAxis over all years of operation since activation date in kWh. To record the average energy for Q1 for example this element would be used with the PeriodFirstQuarterMember on the Period Axis. If the period axis is not used this represents the energy over all years of operation since Activation Date (in kWh).

SystemPerformanceMeasuredEnergyAverageQ4.description: Computed average energy production for the three month period of October, November, and December over all years of operation since Activation Date (in kWh).

MeasuredEnergyToWeatherAdjusted.description: Ratio of measured energy to measured energy adjusted for weather.

MeasuredEnergyWeatherAdjusted.description: Energy generated over reporting period adjusted for the difference between measured weather conditions, e.g., irradiance and temperature, and expected weather conditions for the same period during the Typical Meteorological Year or the equivalent used to predict P50 energy generation and the expected degradation rate.

MeasuredInsolation.description: Actual measured insolation generated in kWh per square meter for a specific duration of time. This is used to measure the insolation from one date to another date. This differs from the element SystemPerformanceMeasuredInsolationAverage which is used to measure system performance from activation date to the current date and can be reported by dividing by periods such as months and quarters or years.

MeasuredInsolationAverage.description: Computed average insolation, for the period defined on the PeriodAxis over all years of operation since activation date in kWh/square meter. To record the average insolation for Q1 for example this element would be used with the PeriodFirstQuarterMember on the Period Axis. If the period axis is not used this represents the insolation over the entire life of the project from activation date up to the contextual date.

MeasuredInsolationAvgMonthlyInceptionToD.description: Computed average monthly insolation, since activation date in kWh/square meter.

MeasuredInsolationToWeatherAdjusted.description: Actual measured insolation divided by weather adjusted insolation.

MeasuredInsolationToWeatherAdjustedIncep.description: Actual measured insolation divided by weather adjusted insolation inception to date.

SystemMethodToDetermineAvailability.description: Description of the method used to determine system availability which could be defined as in IECRE 61724-3 or some other standard method.

RatioNonWeatherCorrected.description: Performance ratio, non-weather corrected calculated per IEC 61724-1 and measured per IEC 61724-2, unless otherwise specified.

RatioWeatherCorrected.description: Performance ratio, weather corrected calculated per IEC 61724-1 and measured per IEC 61724-2, unless otherwise specified.

SystemPVSystemSamplingInterval.description: Rate at which performance data is collected from equipment.

RatioMeasuredEnergyToExpectedEnergyAtThe.description: Ratio of actual measured energy to expected energy at the revenue meter, per IECRE 61724-3.
Ratio of actual measured energy to expected energy at the revenue meter, per IECRE 61724-3, from inception to date.

RatioMeasuredInsolationToP50.description: Actual measured insolation divided by P50 insolation.

RatioMeasuredInsolationToP50InceptionToD.description: Actual measured insolation divided by P50 insolation from inception to date.

WeatherAdjustedEnergyMethodOfAdjustment.description: Description of method used to adjust energy generation for weather.

SystemPermittingDescription.description: Description of project permits required before the project can begin on a single solar installation.

SystemPowerFactor.description: Power factor setting of the power system which is defined as the ratio of the real power flowing to the load, to the apparent power in the circuit. It is a dimensionless number in the closed internal of -1 to +1.

ExpectedEnergyAtP50.description: Expected system production at P50 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 50%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

ExpectedEnergyAtP75.description: Expected system production at P75 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 75%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

ExpectedEnergyAtP90.description: Expected system production at P90 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 90%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

ExpectedEnergyAtP95.description: Expected system production at P95 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 95%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

ExpectedEnergyAtP99.description: Expected system production at P99 which is the expected energy production reached with a probability of 99%. This element is used with the PeriodAxis to indicate the period of production. Usually this will be a year.

SystemStructure.description: Description of the system structure which can be Rooftop, Carport or Ground Mount.

SystemType.description: Indicates the system characterization of the site as either Residential, Community Solar, Commercial, Industrial, Agricultural, Utility.

TargetBalancePeriod.description: Period of time during which the target balance applies.

TaxEquityCashDistributions.description: Amount of the tax equity cash distributions.

TaxEquityCommunicationPlan.description: Description of the developer plan for tax equity reporting and communication including a short description of how the sponsor will interface with the tax equity recipient on consent requests, operating issues, tax return filing, tracking models, operating reports and other issues.

Indicates if there are exceptions to the Tax Indemnity Agreement. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

TaxIndemnityAgreementEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

TaxIndemnityAgreementExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the Tax Indemnity Agreement.

TaxIndemnityAgreementLink.description: Link to the Tax Indemnity Agreement document.

TaxOpinionAvailabilityOfDocument.description: Indicates if the Tax Opinion is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

TaxOpinionAvailabilityOfDocumentExceptio.description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Tax Opinion or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

TaxPreparationFee.description: Amount of tax preparation fees incurred during the period.

TermLoanAvailabilityOfDocumentExceptions.description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Term Loan or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

TermLoanDocumentLink.description: Link to the Term Loan document.

TermLoanEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Term Loan.

TermLoanExceptionDescription.description: Description of any exceptions to the Term Loan or issues raised.

TermLoanExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the Term Loan.

TermSheetAvailabilityOfDocument.description: Indicates if the Term Sheet is available. If it is available, TRUE; if it is not available, FALSE.

TermSheetAvailabilityOfDocumentException.description: Indicates if there are exceptions to the Term Sheet or issues raised. If there are exceptions, TRUE; if there are no exceptions, FALSE.

TermSheetAvailabilityOfFinalDocument.description: Indicates if the Term Sheet is available in final form. If it is available in fnal form, TRUE; if it is only available in draft form, FALSE.

TermSheetDocumentLink.description: Link to the Term Sheet document.

TermSheetEffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the Term Sheet.
